name: Mark The Lion
description: Meet Mark, the Gentle Giant! We're putting our beloved lion, Mark, up for adoption to bring a touch of the wild into a loving home. Mark is more than just a majestic mane; he's a heartwarming companion who loves long naps in the sun and is an expert at 'roaring' away unwanted stress. Adopting Mark will not only give you the king of the jungle as your loyal friend, but you'll also experience the unique joy and awe that comes with caring for such a magnificent creature. Make your home Mark's forever kingdom and embark on an unforgettable adventure filled with love, laughter, and a little bit of lion-sized fun
